html: I'm an American. I don't fear refugees and immigrants. I don't fear access to the voting booth. I don't fear hearing from women. I don't fear gender identity, religion, or ethnicity. But I do question those in power who tell us to fear those who aren't. #MondayMotivation
text:
I'm an American. 
I don't fear refugees and immigrants. 
I don't fear access to the voting booth. 
I don't fear hearing from women. 
I don't fear gender identity, religion, or ethnicity.  

But I do question those in power who tell us to fear those who aren't. 

#MondayMotivation

html: Jin Park was brought here from S. Korea at the age of 7. html: Nobody should be able to buy a gun without a background check. But that happens all the time b/c of the gun show and Charleston loopholes. We finally passed bills - #HR8 & #HR1112 - to fix that & keep dangerous weapons out of dangerous hands. #EndGunViolence #EnoughIsEnoughpic.twitter.com/czKvU0ce7g
text:
Nobody should be able to buy a gun without a background check. But that happens all the time b/c of the gun show and Charleston loopholes. We finally passed bills - #HR8 & #HR1112 - to fix that & keep dangerous weapons out of dangerous hands. 

#EndGunViolence #EnoughIsEnoughpic.twitter.com/czKvU0ce7g

html: I'm honored to be serving as the Speaker Pro Tempore to oversee today's historic vote on a bill to close the loophole that allowed Dylan Roof to buy the gun he used to attack worshipers in Charleston. #HR1112 #EnoughIsEnough #EndGunViolencepic.twitter.com/Zl8YfuIBkh
text: I'm honored to be serving as the Speaker Pro Tempore to oversee today's historic vote on a bill to close the loophole that allowed Dylan Roof to buy the gun he used to attack worshipers in Charleston. #HR1112 #EnoughIsEnough #EndGunViolencepic.twitter.com/Zl8YfuIBkh

html: In 2015, 9 innocent people were gunned down at the Emanuel AME Church in Charleston, SC. The gun used was sold even though the background check wasn't completed. It's past time for thoughts and prayers. We need action. #HR1112 is an important first step.pic.twitter.com/tW3nmaD9wV
text:
In 2015, 9 innocent people were gunned down at the Emanuel AME Church in Charleston, SC.

The gun used was sold even though the background check wasn't completed.
 
It's past time for thoughts and prayers.
 
We need action. #HR1112 is an important first step.pic.twitter.com/tW3nmaD9wV

html: A GOP guide to Executive Orders: If Obama does it, it's illegal. Even if it means protecting children. If Trump does it, it's courageous. Even if it means unilaterally rewriting the Constitution. This guide is also a handy way to measure patriotism vs. loyalty to Trump.
text:
A GOP guide to Executive Orders: 

If Obama does it, it's illegal. Even if it means protecting children. 

If Trump does it, it's courageous. Even if it means unilaterally rewriting the Constitution. 

This guide is also a handy way to measure patriotism vs. loyalty to Trump.

text:
“Russia, if you’re listening, I hope you’re able to find the 30,000 emails that are missing." 

With today's indictment, we now know they were and they did. The question is what did Trump know and why isn't he alarmed at foreign interference in our elections?

html: I want to thank Ryan for his courage, his leadership, and his advocacy which has taken him across the country. Thanks to his work on this bill, I know that we can help more families get through the opioid epidemic together.
text: I want to thank Ryan for his courage, his leadership, and his advocacy which has taken him across the country. Thanks to his work on this bill, I know that we can help more families get through the opioid epidemic together.

html: This bill would authorize the Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration to develop best practices for sober living facilities & provide assistance & support to states so families can have confidence in the facilities that are looking after their loved ones

html: I'll never forget that meeting with Ryan where he detailed the unscrupulous operators and unethical treatment practices which undermined his and his friends' recovery. Together, we worked to craft the Ensuring Access to Quality Sober Living Act of 2017 https://www.congress.gov/bill/115th-congress/house-bill/4684 …pic.twitter.com/tqjaZ1P3Rc

html: Ryan was outraged and heartbroken that yet another friend died a preventable death. Tyler was one of 18 friends Ryan has lost over the years. And so he came to me one day to share his story and seek a solution.
text: Ryan was outraged and heartbroken that yet another friend died a preventable death. Tyler was one of 18 friends Ryan has lost over the years. And so he came to me one day to share his story and seek a solution.

html: Sober living homes can be an essential part of recovery, but many lack training & resources. Tyler's home didn't even have narcan on site, which can counteract an overdose. Ryan said that's like refusing to put lifeboats on an ocean liner.
text:
Sober living homes can be an essential part of recovery, but many lack training & resources. Tyler's home didn't even have narcan on site, which can counteract an overdose. 

Ryan said that's like refusing to put lifeboats on an ocean liner.

html: Recently, Ryan's friend Tyler, also struggling with addiction, died of a heroin overdose while in the care of a sober living home.
text: Recently, Ryan's friend Tyler, also struggling with addiction, died of a heroin overdose while in the care of a sober living home.

html: Our founders included the census in the Constitution so we could have an accurate understanding of our population. html: Officer Greggory Casillas’s dream was to become a police officer. But on March 9, the final day before going out on his own, Officer Casillas was shot in the line of duty. He was a hero who put himself at risk for our safety and we cannot thank him enough.pic.twitter.com/yzTTMJuWv3

html: A week they walked out to protest gun violence, students at Great Mills High School in MD have become the latest victims. I'm sorry for those in pain and fear right now, but I am committed to fighting for them. This will not become our new normal. #EnoughIsEnough
